<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.96</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[true]] when object is in diver state i.e. when unit would put diving [[goggles]] on. <br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative</title><part><name index="1"/><value> Diving [[goggles]] remove blurriness underwater, however when assigned, they do not appear on the face of the unit until the unit steps into the water. This command allows to detect the moment when the goggles are visible. If the unit doesn't have diving goggles assigned, this command would still return [[true]] at appropriate time if the unit steps into the water.</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[getDiverState]] unit </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] when diving [[goggles]] are visible </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _gogglesOn = [[getDiverState]] [[player]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[goggles]], [[removeGoggles]], [[addGoggles]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
